Package src

Class PositionBlock

java.lang.Object
src.PositionBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameVariables
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyBlock, EndBlock, StartingBlock, Wall
public class PositionBlock extends Object implements GameVariables
This class creates a individual block of the maze, which could be a wall, empty space, start block, or end block.
Since:
March 2, 2024
Author:
Nick Clouse, Andrew Denegar, Molly O'Connor

  • Constructor Details

    • PositionBlock

      public PositionBlock(int x, int y, int width, int height, Color c)
      Constructs a new StartingBlock with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate relative to the top-left coordinate of the chunk.
      y - The y-coordinate relative to the top-left coordinate of the chunk.
      width - The width of the block.
      height - The height of the block.
      c - The color of the block.
